name: Tantalus
tagline: This little app allows you to score behavior.
body:
### Welcome to Tantalus
Tantalus is a very simple program which easily runs on Linux, OSX and even Windows. It allows you to manually score e.g. freezing & digging behavior typically observed in behavioral experiments.

### Why the name?
[Tantalus](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tantalus) (lat.) or Tántalos (greek) is a Greek mythological figure most famous for his eternal punishment. I myself am a biologist and typically dislike experiments with negative affect to a certain degree - which is the main reason why I've picked that particular name.

### What is Tantalus?
Admittedly it is a very ugly replacement for an even uglier predecessor (written in 1986 for DOS). But my plans for May-July 2016 are to  make a better version of it.-
